<!--This file is generated-->

This release fixes multi-instance compatibility in 5.8. It is recommended for users utilizing multiple instances of bud (using [`bud.make`](https://bud.js.org/docs/bud.make))

<!--truncate-->

:::info Updates available

There are patches available for [this release](https://bud.js.org/releases/tags/5-8). Please update to [5.8.4](https://bud.js.org/releases/5.8.4).

:::

## Changelog

- [fix(patch): multi-instance compatibility (#1412)](https://github.com/roots/bud/commit/9bd07900c5b98b00b835d53e1dcd4a17e6ee5c1b)
